24namespace vsip

26namespace impl

28
29/***********************************************************************
30 Overloaded Operators
31***********************************************************************/
32
33/// Unary_operator_return_type encapsulates the inference
34/// of a unary operator's return type from its arguments.
35template <template <typename, typename> class View,
36 	  typename Type,
37	  typename Block,
38          template <typename> class Operator,
39	  typename Tag = typename Is_view_type<View<Type, Block> >::type>
40struct Unary_operator_return_type
41{
42  typedef Type value_type;
43
44  typedef expr::Unary<Operator, Block, true> const block_type;
45
46  typedef typename ViewConversion<View, 
47				  value_type, 
48				  block_type>::lazy_view_type view_type;
49};
50
51template <template <typename, typename> class View,
52 	  typename Type,
53	  typename Block>
54inline
55typename Unary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block, expr::op::Plus>::view_type
56operator+(View<Type, Block> const& view)
57{
58  typedef Unary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block, expr::op::Plus> type_trait;
59
60  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
61  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
62  return view_type(block_type(view.block()));
63}
64
65template <template <typename, typename> class View,
66 	  typename Type,
67	  typename Block>
68inline
69typename Unary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block, expr::op::Minus>::view_type
70operator-(View<Type, Block> const& view)
71{
72  typedef Unary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block, expr::op::Minus> type_trait;
73
74  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
75  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
76  return view_type(block_type(view.block()));
77}
78
79} // namespace vsip::impl
80} // namespace vsip
